name: vesting
description: #### 1.) Add 3 Roles (Advisor, Partnerships, Mentors) #### 2.) Dynamic TGE (Token Generation Event) for every role. % of Tokens to be released right after vesting #### 3.) The Vesting should be a linear vesting approach which means it should release some amounts of tokens every day to be claimed by users based upon the allocations decided by the admin.
